mean_cn: adj.引人注目的；令人信服的
mean_en: that makes you pay attention to it because it is so interesting and exciting
sentence: The cowboy gave a compelling performance that nobody could take their eyes off.
sentence_trans: 牛仔的表演如此引人注目以至于没有人能移开眼睛。
word_etyma: com共同 + pell\u003dpel驱动，推 + ing……的 → compelling引人注目的；强制的
